channel.title: Make on Our Embeddeds
channel.description: Recent content in Make on Our Embeddeds

item.title: Armv7m Startup (3) - Make and build process
item.description: In the previous articles, you learned how to write initialization code and put it in the correct place in the processor memory. Now you will learn how to generate the proper binary for send to ROM and will see various tricks to simplify your live with gnu make and Makefile.
